'''''Amon Hen'' 257''' is the two-hundred-and-fifty-seventh issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[2016]].

==Contents==

* Cover: ''[[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] meets [[Shelob]]''
** By: Anne Gavitt
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Artwork: ''[[Nine Rings]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Announcements
* AGM Announcement
* Seminar Announcement
* Artwork: ''[[William]]'s [[Talking purse|Talking Purse]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* All Brân
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* The Burning [[Palantíri|Palantír]] 17
** By: Ian Collier
* Artwork: ''Dragon''
** By: Ian Collier
* Letters
* Review: ''[[There and Back Again: J.R.R. Tolkien and the Origins of The Hobbit|There and Back Again]]''
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Review: ''[[Arda Inhabited]]''
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Artwork: ''[[Barrow-downs|The Barrow Downs]]''
** By: Ian Collier
* News From [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Mathom
** By: Jan Boom
* Artwork: ''Canticle for Elessar''
** By: Jef Murray
* Report: Three Farthing Stone Smial meeting
** By: Maggie Bailey
* Michael's Miscellany
** By: Michael Flowers
* New Members
* Artwork: ''The Inklings''
** By: Alan Knight
* Committee
